name: Miidas
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Miidas is the world's first non-fungible token (NFT) marketplace, launchpad and staking pool for both digital and physical assets. Miidas is also a start-up project that backed by Bitgert Brise blockchain, we are the largest NFT marketplace in the Brise chain and holding a track record of $300k traded volume in June 2022. $Miidas token holder can enjoy special deals and free of charge services including to mint / trade / stake NFTs.
